body_text: persist is used when we need to access the event asynchronously and don't want the event object to be reused. But I don't think we do that anywhere, which means we can remove this.
body: [`persist`](https://facebook.github.io/react/docs/events.html#event-pooling) is used when we need to access the event asynchronously and don't want the event object to be reused. But I don't think we do that anywhere, which means we can remove this.
body_html: persist is used when we need to access the event asynchronously and don't want the event object to be reused. But I don't think we do that anywhere, which means we can remove this.
